thread.title: Staff service is great
thread.title_full: Staff service is great - Review of The Roger, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SanDieganKay
title: Staff service is great
text: The somewhat thin walls between me and my exuberant neighbor family who were definitely coming from a time zone where bedtime was around 2 am New York time, and lack of extra rooms, meant that I had a rocky night of sleep (the folks at the front desk kindly informed the family that they were a bit loud, but kids will be kids). Though it was no one's fault, the front desk consoled me with a voucher for breakfast (which is very high quality) and moved me to another room the next morning.
